instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-3115: What is 820-3115? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: [SOLVED]<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3115</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-b works from charger but no working from battery
threads.message: Hi. Long time i was not here. So i have here water damaged <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3115</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-b board with was totaly dead. i manage to fix to state where is powering up and charging battery but when i disconnect power cable laptop is turning self of i checked voltage on battery connector and battery is charged. When i press power button fan will spin for 2 seconds and stop. any idea ?

threads.title: [SOLVED]<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3115</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-b works from charger but no working from battery
threads.message:
Which is the state of battery reported by OSX?
F7040 voltage with battery only?
Did you check other battery?

threads.title: [SOLVED]<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3115</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-b works from charger but no working from battery
threads.message: battery full charged brand new   f7040 pin 1 and 2 12,53v

threads.title: [SOLVED]<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3115</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-b works from charger but no working from battery
[SOLVED]<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3115</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-b works from charger but no working from battery
[SOLVED]<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3115</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-b works from charger but no working from battery
threads.message: found problem it was <TRANSISTOR>Q5490</TRANSISTOR>. replaced and working now
